value.stringValue: Update a price by applying a percentage
Update a price by replacing it by a new value
Update a price by adding an amount

decisions.label: Check If Price Component is Null

formulas.name: frmColumnLabel
formulas.expression: CASE({!frmSelectedPriceComponent}, "Product Price","CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Product Price, frmTech_New_price__c:New Product Price" , "Transport","CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Transport Price(Unit), frmTech_New_price__c:New Transport Price(Unit)" , "Transport (Per Container)","CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Transport Price (Per Container), frmTech_New_price__c:New Transport Price (Per Container)" , "Energy","CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Energy Surcharge, frmTech_New_price__c:New Energy Surcharge" , "Freight","CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Freight Surcharge, frmTech_New_price__c:New Freight Surcharge" , "Full price (exc. surcharge)" ,"CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Full Price exc. Surchages, frmTech_New_price__c:New Full Price exc. Surchages" , "Full price (inc. surcharge)","CurrencyIsoCode:Currency, frmTech_Current_price__c:Full Price inc. Surchages, frmTech_New_price__c:New Full Price inc. Surchages" , "0")

formulas.name: frmCurrentPrice
formulas.expression: CASE({!frmSelectedPriceComponent}, "Product Price",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!loopProductPrices.Customer_ex_works_price__c}),0, {!loopProductPrices.Customer_ex_works_price__c} )) , "Transport",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK( {!loopProductPrices.TransportPricePerUnit__c} ),0, {!loopProductPrices.TransportPricePerUnit__c} )) , "Transport (Per Container)",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!loopProductPrices.Trasport_price_lumpsum__c}),0,{!loopProductPrices.Trasport_price_lumpsum__c})) , "Energy",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!loopProductPrices.Energy_Surcharge__c}),0,{!loopProductPrices.Energy_Surcharge__c} )) , "Freight",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!loopProductPrices.Freight_Surcharge__c}),0, {!loopProductPrices.Freight_Surcharge__c})) , "Full price (exc. surcharge)",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!loopProductPrices.Full_delivered_Price_exc_surcharge__c} ),0, {!loopProductPrices.Full_delivered_Price_exc_surcharge__c} )) , "Full price (inc. surcharge)",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!loopProductPrices.Full_delivered_Price_inc_surcharge__c}),0, {!loopProductPrices.Full_delivered_Price_inc_surcharge__c} )) , "0")&" "&TEXT({!loopProductPrices.CurrencyIsoCode})

formulas.name: frmFlowSteps
formulas.expression: "Update Target,Selling Entities,Plants,Products,Accounts,Sales Agreements,Update Type,Price Component,"& If(ISBLANK({!frmSelectedLabel}),"Parameters",{!frmSelectedLabel})&",Verify Results,Customer Service,End"

formulas.name: frmLinkedSellingEntity
formulas.expression:
IF( {!frmAccessAll},
"select id,Name,Street__c,City__c,ZipPostalCode__c,Country__c,ERP_Source__c,Site_Code__c from Imerys_Site__c where id in (select Imerys_Selling_Entity__c from SalesAgreementProduct ) LIMIT 500",
"select id,Name,Street__c,City__c,ZipPostalCode__c,Country__c,ERP_Source__c,Site_Code__c from Imerys_Site__c where id in (select Imerys_Selling_Entity__c from SalesAgreementProduct where frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmBPM__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' )")

formulas.name: frmNewEndDateText
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!New_End_Date_X}), ( IF( ISBLANK({!New_End_Date_Y}), IF( (MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z}) < 10 && DAY({!New_End_Date_Z}) < 10), "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Z})), IF( DAY({!New_End_Date_Z}) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Z})), IF( MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z}) < 10, TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Z})), TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Z})) ) ) ), IF( (MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y}) < 10 && DAY({!New_End_Date_Y}) < 10), "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Y})), IF( DAY({!New_End_Date_Y}) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Y})), IF( MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y}) < 10, TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Y})), TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_Y})) ) ) ) ) ), IF( (MONTH({!New_End_Date_X}) < 10 && DAY({!New_End_Date_X}) < 10), "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_X})), IF( DAY({!New_End_Date_X}) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_X})), IF( MONTH({!New_End_Date_X}) < 10, TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_X})), TEXT(DAY({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_End_Date_X})) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: frmNewStartDateText
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!New_Start_Date_A}), ( IF( ISBLANK({!New_Start_Date_B}), IF( (MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C}) < 10 && DAY({!New_Start_Date_C}) < 10), "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_C})), IF( DAY({!New_Start_Date_C}) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_C})), IF( MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C}) < 10, TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_C})), TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_C})) ) ) ), IF( (MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B}) < 10 && DAY({!New_Start_Date_B}) < 10), "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_B})), IF( DAY({!New_Start_Date_B}) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_B})), IF( MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B}) < 10, TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_B})), TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_B})) ) ) ) ) ), IF( (MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A}) < 10 && DAY({!New_Start_Date_A}) < 10), "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_A})), IF( DAY({!New_Start_Date_A}) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_A})), IF( MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A}) < 10, TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/0" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_A})), TEXT(DAY({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR({!New_Start_Date_A})) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: frmQueryLinkedAccount
formulas.expression:
IF({!frmAccessAll},
"select id,Account_Number__c,Name,OwnerId,BillingCity,BillingCountry,Customer_Group__c,ShippingCity,ShippingCountry,Contact__c,CurrencyIsoCode from Account where id in (select AccountId from SalesAgreement ) LIMIT 500",
"select id,Account_Number__c,Name,Customer_Group__c,OwnerId,BillingCity,BillingCountry,ShippingCity,ShippingCountry,Contact__c,CurrencyIsoCode from Account where id in (select AccountId from SalesAgreement where OwnerId='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or Sales_Director__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or Business_Performance_Manager__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' )")

formulas.name: frmQueryLinkedManufacturingPlants
formulas.expression:
IF({!frmAccessAll},
"select id,Name from Imerys_Site__c where ImerysManufacturingPlant__c=TRUE AND id in (select Product_Manufacturing_Plant__c from SalesAgreementProduct where Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!varSelectedSellingEntities}&")) LIMIT 1000",
"select id,Name,LocalProductName__c,StockKeepingUnit,Family,ProductCode,Description,ImerysManufacturingPlant__c,RegionForPlant__c from Product2 where id in (select ProductId from SalesAgreementProduct where Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!varSelectedSellingEntities}&") AND (frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmBPM__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"')) LIMIT 1000 ")

formulas.name: frmQueryLinkedProducts
formulas.expression:
IF({!frmAccessAll},
"select id,Name,New_Product_Type_1__c,LocalProductName__c,Material_Group_5__c,StockKeepingUnit,Family,ProductCode,Description,ImerysManufacturingPlant__c,RegionForPlant__c from Product2 where id in (select ProductId from SalesAgreementProduct where Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!varSelectedSellingEntities}&") ) LIMIT 1000",
"select id,Name,New_Product_Type_1__c,LocalProductName__c,StockKeepingUnit,Material_Group_5__c,Family,ProductCode,Description,ImerysManufacturingPlant__c,RegionForPlant__c from Product2 where id in (select ProductId from SalesAgreementProduct where Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!varSelectedSellingEntities}&") AND (frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmBPM__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"')) LIMIT 1000 ")

formulas.name: frmQueryLinkedSAP
formulas.expression:
IF({!frmAccessAll},
"select Id,frmAccountId__c,SalesAgreementId,productid from SalesAgreementProduct where Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!varSelectedSellingEntities}&") LIMIT 1000",
"select Id,frmAccountId__c,SalesAgreementId,productid from SalesAgreementProduct where Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!varSelectedSellingEntities}&") AND (frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmBPM__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' )" )

formulas.name: frmQueryLinkedSAPReset
formulas.expression:
IF({!frmAccessAll},
"select Id,frmAccountId__c,SalesAgreementId,productid from SalesAgreementProduct LIMIT 1000",
"select Id,frmAccountId__c,SalesAgreementId,productid from SalesAgreementProduct where frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmBPM__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' " )

formulas.name: frmQuerySA_Linked_To_Product
formulas.expression:
IF({!frmAccessAll},
"select id,AccountId from SalesAgreement where id in (select SalesAgreementId from SalesAgreementProduct where productid='"&{!dtblProduct.outputSelectedRow.Id}&"' AND Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!frmRemoveLastComma}&") ) LIMIT 1000",
"select id,AccountId from SalesAgreement where id in (select SalesAgreementId from SalesAgreementProduct where productid='"&{!dtblProduct.outputSelectedRow.Id}&"' and AND Imerys_Selling_Entity__c IN ( "&{!frmRemoveLastComma}&") AND (frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmBPM__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"') )" )

formulas.name: frmQuerySA_Reset
formulas.expression: If({!frmAccessAll}, "select Name,Sales_Agreement_Number__c,Customer__c,End_Customer__c,AccountId,Bill_To__c,Ship_To__c,Description,Negotiation_Status__c,StartDate,EndDate from SalesAgreement where Negotiation_Status__c not in ('Negotiation Not Yet Started','Negotiation Starting Soon') order by LastModifiedDate DESC LIMIT 500" , "select Name,Sales_Agreement_Number__c,Customer__c,End_Customer__c,AccountId,Bill_To__c,Ship_To__c,Description,Negotiation_Status__c,StartDate,EndDate from SalesAgreement where Negotiation_Status__c not in ('Negotiation Not Yet Started','Negotiation Starting Soon') and (ownerid='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or Sales_Director__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or Business_Performance_Manager__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"') order by LastModifiedDate DESC LIMIT 500" )

formulas.name: FrmQuerySAPReset
formulas.expression: If({!frmAccessAll}, "select Name,Sales_Agreement_Number__c,Customer2__c,End_Customer__c,frmAccountId__c,BillTo__c,ShipTo__c,Negotiation_Status__c,StartDate__c,EndDate__c from SalesAgreementProduct where Negotiation_Status__c not in ('S0-Negotiation Not Yet Started') order by LastModifiedDate DESC LIMIT 500" , "select Name,Sales_Agreement_Number__c,Customer2__c,End_Customer__c,frmAccountId__c,BillTo__c,ShipTo__c,Negotiation_Status__c,StartDate__c,EndDate__c from SalesAgreementProduct where Negotiation_Status__c not in ('S0-Negotiation Not Yet Started') and (frmOwnerId__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"' or frmSalesDirector__c='"&{!$User.Id}&"') order by LastModifiedDate DESC LIMIT 500" )

formulas.name: frmScriptTextVerify
formulas.expression: "Please verify that the new prices are correct.You can still remove a price update by deselecting it."

formulas.name: frmTempNewPrice
formulas.expression: CASE({!frmSelectedPriceComponent}, "Product Price",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewProductPrice}),0, {!frmNewProductPrice} )) , "Transport",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewTransportUnitPrice}),0, {!frmNewTransportUnitPrice} )) , "Transport (Per Container)",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewTransportTotalPrice}),0, {!frmNewTransportTotalPrice} )) , "Energy",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewEnergyPrice}),0, {!frmNewEnergyPrice} )) , "Freight",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewFreightPrice}),0, {!frmNewFreightPrice} )) , "Full price (exc. surcharge)",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewFullexcSurchargePrice} ),0, {!frmNewFullexcSurchargePrice} )) , "Full price (inc. surcharge)",TEXT( IF(ISBLANK({!frmNewFullincSurchargePrice}),0, {!frmNewFullincSurchargePrice} )) , "0")&" "&TEXT({!loopProductPrices.CurrencyIsoCode})

formulas.name: New_End_Date_X_Numeric
formulas.expression: TEXT( DAY({!New_End_Date_X}) ) & "/" & TEXT( MONTH({!New_End_Date_X})) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR({!New_End_Date_X}) )

formulas.name: New_End_Date_Y_Numeric
formulas.expression: TEXT( DAY({!New_End_Date_Y}) ) & "/" & TEXT( MONTH({!New_End_Date_Y})) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR({!New_End_Date_Y}) )

formulas.name: New_End_Date_Z_Numeric
formulas.expression: TEXT( DAY({!New_End_Date_Z}) ) & "/" & TEXT( MONTH({!New_End_Date_Z})) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR({!New_End_Date_Z}) )

formulas.name: New_Start_Date_A_Numeric
formulas.expression: TEXT( DAY({!New_Start_Date_A}) ) & "/" & TEXT( MONTH({!New_Start_Date_A})) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR({!New_Start_Date_A}) )

formulas.name: New_Start_Date_B_Numeric
formulas.expression: TEXT( DAY({!New_Start_Date_B}) ) & "/" & TEXT( MONTH({!New_Start_Date_B})) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR({!New_Start_Date_C}) )

formulas.name: New_Start_Date_C_Numeric
formulas.expression: TEXT( DAY({!New_Start_Date_C}) ) & "/" & TEXT( MONTH({!New_Start_Date_C})) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR({!New_Start_Date_C}) )

fields.name: Copy_1_of_NoRecords
fields.fieldText: No Sales Agreement Belongs to you.

value.stringValue: You have chosen to not yet send these records to customer service. The status of these products will move to S1 - Negotiation Starting Soon. This status will indicate that the BPMs have updated the energy surcharge and prepared the price to be validated or updated by the sales manager. The next step in the process is for the Sales Manager to validated / update the price and send it to customer service at which point the status again update. Thank you.

fields.name: NoRecords
fields.fieldText: No Selling Entity Belongs to you.

value.stringValue: Fill in the added amount you want to apply

validationRule.errorMessage: End date cannot be less than Start date

value.stringValue: Fill in the percentage you want to add

validationRule.errorMessage: End date cannot be less than Start date

value.stringValue: Send updated products to Customer Service for ERP price update ?
[{"label":"Nope, I'll wait a little","value":" "},{"label":"Send to Customer Service","value":" "}]
Fill in the new price you want to apply

validationRule.errorMessage: End date cannot be less than start date
